comment: This is a page from a classical Chinese text, likely a version of the 'Shuowen Jiezi' (说文解字), specifically Volume 12 (第十二). The characters are written in seal script (篆书), arranged vertically in columns. Each character is followed by its department (部) number (e.g., 部四百 for 'Department 400') and a sequential number (e.g., 十四 for 14). The right margin contains additional annotations including page numbers (小二百五十八) and possibly publisher or edition details (嚴華).
